description: Soon to be stepbrothers Matthew Ryder and Tom Faulk come back from a night out, and things start to heat up after Tom confronts Matthew about being gay. Matthew mistakenly takes Tom’s choice of topic as an advance so he goes in for a kiss, but straight stepbrother to-be quickly shuts him down. Tom makes it clear that he is fully hetero but Matthew is just way too charming. Tom decides he can help out after all. He starts by letting Matthew suck his cock, and then has him lift his legs so he can jam his dick into his future step bro’s excited hole.
title: Not Brothers Yet Part 5
